game.name: Box Maze Extreme
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Think you’ve got what it takes?Challenge yourself with 30 extreme levels!Face more enemies and obstacles, with checkpoints instead of saves.Box Maze Extreme is not for the faint-hearted.Includes FREE skins!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Think you’ve got what it takes?Challenge yourself with 30 extreme levels!Face more enemies and obstacles, with checkpoints instead of saves.Box Maze Extreme is not for the faint-hearted.Includes FREE skins!
